text: Ana chichi chisawisye kukwenu (chakuntendekasya) kuti nkaputa ngondo petala lya Allah, ni (kwakulupusya) ŵali ŵangalikombolela mwa achalume, achakongwe ni ŵanache, ŵakasatiji: “Ambuje ŵetu! Tukoposyani m'musiwu (wa Maaka) wauli achinsyene ŵakwe ŵalupuso, soni tuŵichilani kuumila Kukwenu nkutugosa, soni tuŵichilani kuumila Kukwenu nkutukamuchisya.”
